title: The 2022 Hyundai Ioniq 5’s Futuristic Appeal
sub_head: Though comparable to the Kia EV6, Hyundai’s Ioniq 5 separates itself from the EV pack with modern exterior styling that signals an electrified ride
body:
“HOW DID you get one?”
Holding his young daughter by the hand, a father walked across the parking lot to get a better look at the 2022 Hyundai Ioniq 5 Limited AWD, an amiable and feature-rich electric crossover dressed in Euclidean couture.
